fields.text: Thank you for calling Founders Fund, a San Francisco venture capital firm investing in smart people solving difficult problems.
If you are an entrepreneur seeking funding, press [INDEX] to choose that menu.
To submit a new pitch deck, press [INDEX] to choose that menu.
Please hold while we connect you to our investment team.
To follow up on an existing application, press [INDEX] to choose that menu.
One moment please, connecting you to our partnerships manager.
For information about our firm, press [INDEX] to choose that menu.
To hear our latest portfolio highlights, press [INDEX] to choose that menu.
Please hold for recent success stories from our portfolio companies.
To speak with our general inquiries desk, press [INDEX] to choose that menu.
Please hold while we transfer you to a representative.
